```{r}
Cycles<-WS.data %>% select(SiteID, Date, Zone, Sub_region, Aragonite_Sat_W, BestSalinity, Month, Precipitation) 

clycle<- ggplot(Cycles, aes(x=Date)) +
  
  theme_bw() +
  #scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0,5.5),
  #                     name=("Aragonite Saturation") ,
  #                     breaks = seq(0, 5, 1),  
   #                    expand = c(0, 0)) +
  #scale_x_date(name="Date",
               #labels = date_format("%M/%Y"),
               #limits = c(-1,114),
   #            expand = c(0, 0),
    #           breaks ="6 months")+
  
geom_smooth(aes(x=Date, y=(Aragonite_Sat_W), colour=Zone), span= 0.3, se=FALSE)+
geom_point(aes(x=Date, y=Aragonite_Sat_W, fill=Precipitation), shape=21, alpha=0.5, size=1)+ 
geom_abline(slope = 0, intercept = 3, color="gray", linetype=2)+
  
theme(legend.position=c(0.65, 0.05),
      legend.direction = "horizontal",
      legend.title = element_blank(),
          plot.background=element_blank(),
          axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5),
          panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(),
          panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(),
          panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(),
          panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank(),
          legend.box.background = element_rect(),
          panel.background =element_rect(fill = NA, color = "black")
          )
clycle  +  facet_wrap(Sub_region~.)
```



```{r}
Cycles<-WS.data %>% select(SiteID, Date, Zone, Sub_region, Aragonite_Sat_W, BestSalinity, Month, Precipitation) 
summary(Cycles$Month)
str(Cycles$Month)
Cycles$Months<-as.numeric(Cycles$Month)-9

clycle<- ggplot(Cycles, aes(x=Months)) +
  
  theme_bw() +
  #scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0,5.5),
  #                     name=("Aragonite Saturation") ,
  #                     breaks = seq(0, 5, 1),  
   #                    expand = c(0, 0)) +
  #scale_x_date(name="Date",
               #labels = date_format("%M/%Y"),
               #limits = c(-1,114),
   #            expand = c(0, 0),
    #           breaks ="6 months")+
  
geom_smooth(aes(x=Months, y=(Aragonite_Sat_W), colour=Zone), span= 0.7, se=FALSE)+
geom_point(aes(x=Months, y=Aragonite_Sat_W, fill=Precipitation), shape=21, alpha=0.5, size=1)+ 
geom_abline(slope = 0, intercept = 3, color="gray", linetype=2)+
  
theme(legend.position="top",
      legend.direction = "horizontal",
      legend.title = element_blank(),
          plot.background=element_blank(),
          axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5),
          panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(),
          panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(),
          panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(),
          panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank(),
          legend.box.background = element_rect(),
          panel.background =element_rect(fill = NA, color = "black")
          )
clycle  +  facet_wrap(Sub_region~.)

```
